content.rendered: Welcome to the BFF Summer Vibes games. Summer is here and these rainbow high school girls need to get ready for it! How about you, are you ready for summer? These girls need a summer touch when it comes to their wardrobe and it would be nice if you could help them out. So check out the latest summer trends and then turn these princesses into some real divas! You have a whole wardrobe stacked with dresses, tops, skirts and so many accessories at your disposal. Play and have fun!
